chunk:
Plexaderm Rapid Reduction Serum

Brand: Plexaderm

Category: Around Eye Cream

Ingredients: Water (Aqua), Sodium Silicate, Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Butylene Glycol, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Palmitoyl Oligopeptide, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Chrysin, Xanthan Gum, Carbomer, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin.

Directions: Apply a thin layer to clean,

thin layer to clean, dry skin around the eyes twice a day or as needed.

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
